text: Liparis bautingensis is a species of plant in the family Orchidaceae. It is endemic to the Hainan region of southern China.Kew World Checklist of Selected Plant FamiliesFlora of China v 25 p 221, 保亭羊耳蒜 bao ting yang er suan, Liparis bautingensis Tang & F. T. Wang, Acta Phytotax. Sin. 12: 39. 1974. Liparis bautingensis is listed as an endangered species.China Plant Specialist Group 2004. Liparis bautingensis. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 22 August 2007. == References == bautingensis Category:Endemic orchids of China Category:Flora of Hainan Category:Plants described in 1974 Category:Endangered plants Category:Threatened flora of Asia Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Liparis bautingensis
